project_name: Web3 Billing & Invoicing System – Building Verifiable Workflows on Filecoin for Digital Public Goods
filecoin_growth_impact:
The Web3 Billing and Invoicing System on Filecoin contributes directly to the Filecoin economy by enabling FIL-denominated billing, subscription, and data-storage payments through its PPT utility token, deployed on Filecoin Mainnet [1] and Sushiswap liquidity pools.

As a developer tooling and utility, it powers transparent invoicing workflows for governance, healthcare, and mobility applications while being available to all Filecoin ecosystem organizations seeking verifiable billing infrastructure.

Through interoperability with the PLDG Invoice Generator, the system supported payments amounting to approximately $350,000 USD (paid in FIL) — representing tangible, recurring utility activity across contributors and ecosystem collaborators in India and globally PLDG transaction records[2].

 Cumulatively, the platform has powered around 300–400 FIL in direct invoicing and subscription-related transactions, reinforcing Filecoin’s role as a trusted, auditable, and programmable financial layer for decentralized organizations.

By bridging workflows between Filecoin, Optimism, and Storacha, and providing open SDKs and API templates, it strengthens the real-world adoption loop — enabling developers, DAOs, and civic institutions to transact and settle work transparently using FIL.

References:
[1] Filfox link: https://filfox.info/en/address/0x4D6a9ed35609fe08FB7d012AD3372472bb8A3a59

[2] PLDG Data Archive of Invoice Transactions on Filecoin Mainnet viewed via Filfox: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ysdWE-qBGlF4GjK9Er5XmZHB9ShnlYQe?usp=drive_link
description:
Web3 Billing & Invoicing System establishes a trusted, Web3-native billing and work order infrastructure powered by Filecoin and IPFS. Designed for government, healthcare, mobility, and civic organizations, it enables tamper-proof, verifiable invoices stored on decentralized storage. 

Since November 2024, it has powered cross-chain deployments across Filecoin and seven EVM chains, supporting projects like Eth Gov Ops, Transport DAO, Eth Maintenance, ZK Medical Billing, and OP Medicine. 

Through token-gated workflows, audit-ready storage, and cross chain interoperability, it empowers developers and institutions to adopt transparent, cost-efficient, and verifiable billing—driving real FIL-denominated activity and expanding Filecoin’s role in digital public infrastructure.
additional_impact:
Beyond technical tooling, the Web3 Billing and Invoicing System on Filecoin serves as a public-good reference implementation for decentralized invoicing across government, education, and healthcare.

 It has expanded Filecoin visibility and adoption via Code For Gov Tech, PLDG cohorts, open GitHub demos, and social threads.

Collaborators from Storacha, libp2p, multiformats have participated in reviews and integrations, reinforcing ecosystem cohesion.

The project’s interoperability with Ethereum L1 and L2 Chains like Optimism, Polygon and Starknet, Hedera and PayPalUSD-integrated billing apps positions Filecoin as a backbone for transparent, cross-chain, and auditable data systems powering real-world digital governance.
end_user:
Web3 Billing & Invoicing System serves a growing ecosystem of public institutions, developers, and Web3 partners leveraging Filecoin for verifiable data integrity. Public educational institutions and organizations in India have started using Web3 billing utility to issue and validate invoices through tamper-proof, on-chain workflows, improving transparency, auditability, and trust in operations. 

Developers across India and beyond integrate FILSafe modules via the C4GT website & Dashboard to embed Filecoin-backed billing and work order systems directly into their applications. 

Ecosystem collaborators such as Optimism, Starknet, and PayPal USD -integrated projects adopt FILSafe for interoperable, audit-ready storage—further strengthening Filecoin’s role as the trusted backbone for transparent, cross-chain digital infrastructure.

how_many_package_downloads:
The SDK modules and starter templates (React, Ionic, and Flutter) from the Web3 Billing and Invoicing System on Filecoin have collectively reached over 200+ cumulative downloads/clones from GitHub and npm since November 2024.
 Adoption has been strong within PLDG, FIL-oz, and Storacha communities, with continuous engagement following the release of token-gated APIs and decentralized storage integrations using Filecoin, Storacha, and Lighthouse.
how_many_dependents:
Around 6–8 active and experimental FVM projects have integrated or forked modules from the Web3 Billing and Invoicing System on Filecoin.  

 These include use cases across Eth Gov Ops, Eth Maintenance, ZK Medical Billing, Transport DAO, and OP Medicine, all leveraging Filecoin for verifiable record storage and decentralized audit trails.
Additionally, the PLDG Dashboard integrates APIs from this system to demonstrate token-gated workflows for developers in India and globally.

 Open repositories such as GovtInvoice (please visit https://github.com/seetadev/GovtInvoice), fil-token-gated-dapp-de-storage (please visit https://github.com/seetadev/fil-token-gated-dapp-de-storage ) web3-invoice-token-gated-storacha (https://github.com/seetadev/web3-invoice-token-gated-storacha), and  are actively forked and reused by Filecoin ecosystem builders for work order and record management applications.

Top 5 high-impact projects using Web3 Billing and Invoicing system funded by C4GT with support from Gates Foundation, Github, & feedback from Storacha team:

ZK Medical Billing – Starknet-based zero-knowledge patient billing.

Eth Elder Ease – On-chain billing for senior care services (Storacha).

PyUSD Invoice Manager – PayPal USD stablecoin invoicing with Filecoin storage.

Eth Maintenance – Infrastructure maintenance and vendor billing (C4GT).

OP Medicine – Optimism RetroPGF-supported healthcare billing.

Please find more details on these top 5 high-impact projects listed at https://tinyurl.com/Web3-Billing-FVM (long URL: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Xs6OIrJssqsZlEpT0J2Ucae8rZAzE_2DlsH6eE4PS6w/edit?usp=sharing )
